trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several layout-oriented user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en kontroll som redigeringsprogrammet som gir sluttbrukerne mulighet til å redigere flere egenskaper for oppsettet orientert bruker-brukergrensesnittet (UI) på en tilknyttet <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the layout of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen LayoutEditorPart er en kontroll som redigeringsprogrammet som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klasse, og brukes til å redigere egenskaper som påvirker oppsettet for en tilknyttet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Just as there are tool-oriented zones in the Web Parts control set (for details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class overview), there are tool-oriented part controls (tool parts), and each tool part must reside in a certain type of tool zone.
trans-unit.target: Bare som verktøyet orientert soner i webdeler kontrollen settet (for mer informasjon, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>klassen oversikt over) verktøyet orientert del kontroller (verktøydeler) og hver tool-delen må befinne seg i en bestemt type verktøyet sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Tool parts in the Web Parts control set have two distinguishing characteristics: - They are helper controls that enable end users to personalize controls on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: Verktøyet delene i webdeler kontrollen settet har to spesiell egenskaper:-de er helper kontroller som brukes til sluttbrukerne mulighet til å tilpasse på en webdeler side.

trans-unit.source: - They are visible only in certain display modes.
trans-unit.target: -De er bare synlige i enkelte visningsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart control is a tool part that becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen LayoutEditorPart inngår verktøyet som vises bare når en webdeler-siden er i redigeringsmodus, og når en bestemt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen er valgt for redigering.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> control.
trans-unit.target: Som alle andre kontrollen LayoutEditorPart <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontrollerer, finnes i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>sone kan bare inneholde <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontroller, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Kontroller kan ikke plasseres i en annen type sone.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart class has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A> property, which gets or sets the title for a layout control.
trans-unit.target: Klassen LayoutEditorPart har en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A>-egenskapen som henter eller angir tittelen for en oppsettet-kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The class also has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A> property, which overrides the base property and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Klassen har også en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A>-egenskapen som overstyrer egenskapen basis, og returnerer `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.Display%2A>

trans-unit.source: This means that the LayoutEditorPart control is always visible when the page is in edit mode, even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Dette betyr at LayoutEditorPart kontrollen er alltid synlig når siden er i redigeringsmodus, selv om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>egenskap i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen redigeres er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: In other words, users can always edit the properties in a LayoutEditorPart control, even if a specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control cannot be edited by the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Brukere kan med andre ord, alltid redigere egenskapene i en LayoutEditorPart kontroll, selv om det er et angitt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen ikke kan redigeres av de andre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart class also has two important methods, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, which it inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class and overrides.
trans-unit.target: Klassen LayoutEditorPart også er to viktige metoder <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>, som arver fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klassen og overstyringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The methods are critical because they enable getting and setting the property values between the field values of the editor control and the properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control being edited.
trans-unit.target: Metodene som er viktige fordi de Aktiver hente og angi egenskapsverdiene mellom feltverdiene kontrollens redigeringsprogrammet og egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollere redigeres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the LayoutEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:layouteditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: I de fleste tilfeller LayoutEditorPart kontrollen skal brukes på sider utholdenhet av deklarerer en `<asp:layouteditorpart>` element i en `<zonetemplate>` elementet som i sin tur inneholder en `<asp:editorzone>` element på en webside.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart control enables end users to edit the following UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: LayoutEditorPart-kontrollen kan sluttbrukerne mulighet til å redigere Brukergrensesnittet egenskaper for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>til å redigere andre egenskaper og virkemåten for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroller, kan du bruke den andre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Kontroller angitt med webdeler kontrollen settet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Dette omfatter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Kontroller må gi de fleste redigering funksjonene som er nødvendig for å redigere <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroller, men du kan også opprette en egendefinert redigeringsprogrammet-kontroll ved arving fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klasse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: For kodeeksempel en, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>klassen oversikt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the LayoutEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å forbedre tilgjengelighet, gjengis LayoutEditorPart kontrollen i en `<fieldset>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the LayoutEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: Den `<fieldset>` elementet grupperer relaterte settet med kontroller som brukes til å redigere i LayoutEditorPart kontrollen, og den muliggjør følgende navigasjon blant kontrollene for både visual brukeragenter (for eksempel vanlig nettlesere) og tale orientert brukeragenter (for eksempel programvare).

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengelighet markup gjengis som standard for denne kontrollen, kan ikke med kravene for tilgjengelighet standarder som Web innhold tilgjengelighet retningslinjene 1.0 (WCAG) prioritet 1 retningslinjene.

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om tilgjengelighet støtte for denne kontrollen, kan du se [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av klassen.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutEditorPart constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren LayoutEditorPart er standard. Ingen konstruktør er deklarert i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>klassen, og derfor ikke spesielle oppgaver utføres når en ny forekomst av klassen opprettes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Normally you do not need to use the constructor, because you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control to a page declaratively at design time.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis du trenger ikke å bruke konstruktøren, fordi du kan legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>kontroll på en side deklarativt under utformingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control programmatically for some reason, you can use the LayoutEditorPart constructor.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis du skal legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>kontrollen programmatisk på grunn av noe du kan bruke LayoutEditorPart-konstruktøren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer verdier fra en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"> </xref> kontrollen til de tilsvarende egenskapene i den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ApplyChanges er en kritisk metode på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Den metoden formålet er å lagre verdiene som en bruker er angitt for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>kontrollen til de tilsvarende egenskapene i den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control's inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den tilknyttede kontrollen det refereres til i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>kontrollen er arvet <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > You cannot call the ApplyChanges method from your own code.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Du kan ikke kalle metoden ApplyChanges fra din egen kode.

trans-unit.source: However, if you need more programmatic control over the process of editing various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control properties than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control provides, you can create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> control and provide your own implementation of this method.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid Hvis du trenger mer programmatisk kontroll over prosessen med å redigere ulike <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollerer egenskaper enn de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>kontrollen gir, kan du opprette en egendefinert <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>kontrollere og angi din egen implementering av denne metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Et eksempel kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set the following properties on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> The ApplyChanges method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Metoden ApplyChanges prøver å angi følgende egenskaper for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>for ApplyChanges-metoden når brukeren klikker en knapp for OK eller et Bruk verb i redigering brukergrensesnittet (UI).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Zone%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis handlingen lagring verdier fra det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"> </xref> styre til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen er vellykket; ellers (Hvis det oppstår en feil), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when setting the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState*> property on the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feilen under angivelse av verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState*>egenskapen for den tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState*>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property inherited from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.
trans-unit.target: Overstyrer egenskapen base arvet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> kontrollen for å skjule egenskapen fra utviklere og hindre at den blir påvirket av oppsett.

trans-unit.source: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.
trans-unit.target: Selv om det er offentlig, denne egenskapen brukes til standard gjengivelse av denne kontrollen, og skal ikke kalles fra developer kode.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control that receives the default focus in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder IDen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"> </xref> kontrolltypen får standard fokus i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en kontroll skal vises når de tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The Display property returns `true` even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A> property is `false` on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Vis egenskapen returnerer `true` selv om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>egenskapen `false` for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control can always be available in edit mode, even when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control cannot be edited by the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: Dette er slik at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>kontrollen kan alltid være tilgjengelig i redigeringsmodus, selv når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen ikke kan redigeres av de andre <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>Kontroller.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi som angir om kontrollen skal vises.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter egenskapsverdier fra en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollere og tilordner dem til det tilknyttede <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SyncChanges er en kritisk metode på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the child controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: Den implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>metoden fra basisklassen, henter gjeldende verdier fra det tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen, og oppdateringer barnet kontroller i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>kontroll med verdiene slik at en bruker kan redigeres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SyncChanges kalles når verdiene i den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen kan ha endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method immediately after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: For en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>kontroll, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>sone som inneholder kontrollen kaller metoden SyncChanges umiddelbart etter kall av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>metode, slik at verdiene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>kontrollen er alltid synkronisert med verdiene i den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is initially entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: En annen tilfeller der metoden SyncChanges kalles er når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen opprinnelig går inn i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en tittel for redigeringsprogrammet for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdien tittel vises i tittellinjen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>kontrollerer når kontrollen er synlig i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Når kontrollen er deklarert i en side, kan du angi en verdi for den `Title` attributtet.

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for tittelen, brukes en standardverdi for kulturen bestemte for beskrivelse av for egenskapene som kontrollen tillater at brukere redigerer.

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som brukes som tittelen på kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en beregnet kontroll ble levert av webdeler kontrollen settet.
